how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Spray mini fragrance in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that you get a variety of scents that you can travel with in your purse. I also leave some on my car just in case. My favorite is the scent that smells most similar to Cool Water for women. The scents are long lasting and this many scents in one package are worth it for the price. It would be nice if it came with a small bag to carry all of the scents since they're small and can be lost pretty easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this sampler set during the December sale. I needed another  random Christmas present but honestly, these are little samples that  you usually get for free. This is kind of expensive if you ask me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This sampler set smells AMAZING. I can spray it twice and it will last all day long. I have gotten so many compliments when wearing several of these scents. Iu2019m not sure I could pick a favorite because I love them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: think this is a good product if you are trying to learn what kind of perfume notes you like. Generally this sample set has pretty fresh and earthy scents so if thatu2019s what you like then you might really like this set. I liked 4 of the scents a lot and the rest not as much.  I wish it came with some kind of card explaining the notes in each perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love all these little perfume samples! Were the perfect stocking stuffer for my daughter and also I get to try some out too:) she loves picking out a different scent each day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that I have different scents for every day, and I can carry them in my bag.

reviews.review_title: Great for perfume lovers and beginners!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found this set to be perfect for perfume lovers and beginners. Out of the 10 complex scents in this set. I liked 5 of them and disliked the other 5. Personally I would have loved one or two more fruity scents, which is why I canu2019t rate these 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set! Being able to sample different ones and see how they settle on the skin is amazing! I like all of the scents, replica does a great job recreating scents and taking you to the place or memory itu2019s trying to convey. My favorites are beach walk and fire place. Beach walk has a wonderful sunscreen undertone that I feel so many beach perfumes miss. And fireplace settles down to smell like youu2019ve been at a bonfire. I will be purchasing these for sure and possible others as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is good for discovering the different scents in the replica selection. I smelled a few of them before receiving the discovery set. I have a few I would consider wearing recurringly in addition to something like *quaphor since the fragrance does not linger throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the variety of this box. I have been interested in trying Replica, but this is the first time Iu2019ve given them ago. I found a few of the scents were not my thing and a few I absolutely loved. Some of the big winners for me were Jazz Club, By the Fireplace, and Under the Lemon Tree.

reviews.review_title: Pricey but nice if you like changing scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The set is a good option to explore the scents or if you can find it in the store. Some of the scents does remind me of the scene like fireplace and when the rain stops. I have to say, they do smell luxurious. As for why the 4 stars? The price. It's pretty pricey just to try since they are really really small samples and there are no voucher to redeem a full size or discount towards the full size.
Smells good, love the variety Smells good, love the variety Smells good, love the variety Smells good, love the variety

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for people who want to tap into niche perfumes. I would describe Replica as the introduction to the world of niche fragrances. It offers great variety of scents so you can find out what type of fragrance or what notes you like. It also makes a great gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I love Replica so I was very excited to receive this sampler set! My favorites are Under the Lemon Tree and When the Rain Stops. I also love Autumn Vibes. I gave Jazz Club to my wife and she loves it. Exploration kits are the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After smelling the different perfumes, I have found that there have been some that I liked and others that were not to my taste. Overall, I may or may not use any of these scents again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This box had a lot of samples and variations of the replica perfumes! Itu2019s a great way to explore the perfumes especially if youu2019re not sure which one you want to purchase. I personally fell in love with on a date and by the fire place

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the package includes a good variety of perfumes to try. Itu2019s a good set to try out different scents before buying a full size. All the scents are quite different and must have for everyone. Also they are good for travel and you can take your favorite scent with you everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the small sizes of these. Great to try each scent. Good to travel with. Scents are great and last all day. Overall I really love the quality and definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful and I love how this pack gives you the option to test all of the scents to find a favorite! I received this product for free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the REPLICA Memory Box Sampler Set, and while the concept of evoking memories through scent is intriguing, this collection wasnu2019t quite for me. The fragrances leaned heavily toward florals, which felt more classic and matureu2014perhaps better suited for those who enjoy timeless, vintage-inspired scents. Personally, I found the selection to appeal more to an older generation, and none of the perfumes truly resonated with my style.  That said, scent is deeply personal, and I can see these working beautifully for someone with a love for florals or a preference for more sophisticated fragrances. If youu2019re curious, the sampler is a great way to explore without committing to a full bottle. Just not my vibe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not knowing which perfume to gift someone? This set works perfect for that!! Gives them a little bit of the whole collection and allows them to wear the scent. Few of these are masculine scents that I wouldnu2019t wear so definitely a plus to know what works for and what doesnu2019t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample to try and review and loved it! I am a long time lover of this brand and love getting the chance to try scents I donu2019t already own!

reviews.review_title: A daily staple in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sampler perfume set is fantastic! The scents are long-lasting and not overpowering. A great way to experience REPLICAu2019s collection and find a signature scent, or as a gift to someone else. My favorite is Lazy Sunday Morning! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In transparency I was sent this for free to review. I have been changing these out and using them all month. My favorites are the clean scents. Bubble bath smells amazing and last on my skin all day. I will probably end up buying a full size. This is a great way to try out the brand and see what suits you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On sals, this is a great buy. Youu2019re getting sample size vilesu2026 so itu2019s not a ton of product, but it is a discovery set so itu2019s fine. I liked ones I thought Iu2019d hate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are perfect to bring in your purse or fanny pack. They are so cute and they smell soo good. These are my new favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed receiving this product because there are some scents in here that I ended up loving and would have never thought to try and buy this. So I'm glad I got it to sample.  I recommend this product, it would be a good gift idea as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is great to get all the samples before getting a full size one, definitely loved When the rain stops, Beach walk, Jazz club, bubble and specially Under the lemongrass trees. The other 5 options were not to my liking.  Most of them are not very long lasting and that's the big negative for me, I know it is eau de toilette so it's not supposed to last as long as perfum.  Overall I wouldn't buy it.

reviews.review_title: Worth it to try out the fragrances for cheap.
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried all of these and they are all pretty good but I definitely think that jazz club and by the fireplace are the best out of the line. The only reason I didnu2019t give this a 5 star rating was because a lot of them just arenu2019t for me but I feel that it is worth it for the average person so they can try out these fragrances for cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: you can get a lot of uses out of the tiny bottle it comes in which was surprising. I would make sure to spray it vertically to prevent it from squirting out rather than spraying. Its fragrances arenu2019t necessarily the best, they are more masculine and definitely are strong. They lowkey give me headaches so one max 2 sprays is fine for me.

reviews.review_title: Great gift for anyone who is new to fragrances
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Replica Sample Pack is such a fun way to try out different scents! It comes with 10 of Maison Margielau2019s fragrances, and thereu2019s something for every mood.  My top three favorites are On a Date, Bubble Bath, and Lazy Sunday Morning. On a Date is so romantic and perfect for evenings out. Bubble Bath smells super clean and comforting, and Lazy Sunday Morning is fresh and light, great for everyday wear.  The little sample sizes are great for testing before buying a full bottle, and each one lasts a few uses. Itu2019s also a great gift idea for anyone who loves perfume. If youu2019re looking to find your next favorite scent, this pack is definitely worth it!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for someone who needs a new perfume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great to try if you have never felt these perfumes. Replica has some of the best smelling product. Definitely give this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells absolutely amazing, all of them. I love the variety and they remind me of a sunny beach day.

reviews.review_title: Perfect gift to gift or keep!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great gift for yourself or someone else! I love the unique variety the truly transports you. Like by the fireplace legit smells like I was just by the fireplace/at a bonfire!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There are def scents I did not like at all, however, this is a great way to sample a variety of scents and still having the opportunity you to wear them a few times. I think Iu2019ve definitely found my favorite and plan on buying a full size one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a great variety to have on hand if you are someone who like to switch up their scent very often. These are just what they may smell like to me. The beach did smell a stereotypically beachy. The date smelled a bit similar but not as strong. The rain seemed floral. The autumn was lightly spicy, maybe cinnamon. Sailing seemed salty with a hint of musk. I think Jazz was the most lightly scented, like a thin musk. Lazy smelled kind of like peanut butter to me, maybe a scent from a kitchen. Bubble was pretty strong, but clean smelling. The fire was probably the strongest scent, it reminded me of vinegar bbq sauce. Lemon was my favorite, but it did seem more like a citrus blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving all of the scents in this sampler set! My current favorites are By the Fireplace and Lazy Sunday Morning. Each one is unique and really great!
Great product. I love all the scents and really showed me which ones were my type of scent. Love it and good size for testing.

reviews.review_title: Such a great value to pick your signature scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review*  Okay, I actually love this sampler set! I have always wanted to take the plunge and buy a full size bottle from this brand but I always feel so overwhelmed going into sephora and smelling all of the perfumes at once. I feel like all the scents end up mixing together and then I get an awful headache. This way, though, I was able to sample a few and wear the ones I liked from the bottle for a day and see how it smelled on me throughout the day. I feel like perfume smells differently on the body then in the bottle so it was great to be able to test it out on my bodyu2019s chemistry! I will be testing a few more and buying a full size ofu2026probably a few at this pointud83eudd2d great product if youu2019re gifting someone who doesnu2019t have their signature scent down yet!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect set If you donu2019t know which perfume to choose from this incredible brand. You have a lot of options to test and use throughout a week to figure out which one to buy. Yet, honestly, all of them are incredibly good and it might take you some time to decide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this sampler set. Every little bottle has an amazing smell and lasts very long. Itu2019s amazing and definitely good for travel or just to have on your desk. The smells are nice and strong and I truly enjoy using it in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Theyu2019re the perfect gift for those who like perfume and travel! I love all of the smells and the sampler set has 10 very nice fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This sampler set is so perfect! Iu2019ve always loved the replica scents but the price tag stopped me from purchasing anything. Theyu2019re so unique and truly smell like what the name is describing. My faves are Under The Lemon Tree and Sailing Day. This would make a great gift for the fragrance lover in your life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The size of these samples are a lot bigger than I expected. At least twice the size of the little free ones you get. I think this is a great way to find a new scent. Iu2019ve had a travel size of one of replicas scents in the past and felt it had good lasting power. Iu2019m not sure if I would purchase this at the $39 price point but I donu2019t think itu2019s absurdly priced either. This sample includes a wide range of different notes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Recently I have been a huge fan of accessorizing my outfits with a few spritz of perfume. I received this for an honest review and hereu2019s my thought:  1. The scents truly smell like what they are meant to be. For example, autumn vibes smell like a trip to the mountain during September where the leaves are changing colors and every step, you hear crunching from the floor. I was blown away by how accurately this scent was recreated.  2. My personal fave must be Lazy Sunday Morning. It evokes a feeling of sunlight seeping through the curtain of my bedroom. Laundry was just folded and thereu2019s a lingering scent remaining on my sheets. Truly so relaxing and fresh.  3. These small testers allow me to switch it up throughout the week, to match my mood, the event, and outfit.   Highly recommend this for anyone who wants to try new fragrance but donu2019t know where to start.

reviews.review_title: A great variety of scents for all seasons!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster in exchange for my honest review. This is such a great perfume sampler! So many great fragrances for lots of different seasons and occasions. Most of them seem really different from each other and I found several favorites! the On A Date scent is my favorite, I can see this one as daily wear, very fresh and beautiful. I would definitely recommend this sampler to anyone looking to try out different scents, who has a love of perfumes. If you're just looking to purchase one perfume though, I don't think it's worth the purchase of the whole sample set. I love changing my scents up all the time so I'll be using this set for a while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think this sampler set is the perfect way to figure out which scent you gravitate to the most. All of these scents smell amazing and a great way to figure out your fav before pulling the trigger on the bigger sizes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice sample I got from influenster to try out. I do have to say it is very mixed because some scents I really like and others I would not touch again. I personally would not pay for it, I would just sample in store because of how little you get. It is good if you are really unsure and want to see how it works for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much. Itu2019s kind of hard to choose a favorite scent. This is wonderful as a gift to anyone. I especially love it because I can slip one in my makeup bag and always have one with me one the go! Would totally buy! Especially because thereu2019s enough for not only me to use but also my husband and teenager.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sample kit came with a ton of fragrances. Every bottle, even though they're small, goes a long way. My ultimate favorite is the fireplace scent. The rest sre just a bit too strong for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this. I do feel like these fragrances invoke memories. But I came here to tell you that as a massage therapist a while back I had a celebrity on my table and she smelled sooooo good. I wanted to ask her what fragrance she was wearing so badly but of course I would never. As soon as I tested this set I realizedu2026it was Under The Lemon Tree! Iu2019m so excited I figured it out. Choose these if you want to smell unique. I did receive this set in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay wow, I actually canu2019t believe it but I love every single scent in this sampler pack. There is not a bad one. You can go right down the line. I would say they are all light and have a slight musk. They are not floral which I love. If I could own a full bottle of each, I would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this a great sampler set for anyone on the hunt for a new scent. I like several of these scents & a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smells are hits and misses maybe itu2019s just my pallet of smell that I like wearing but worth the try to see if any would buy later on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great variety of scents to try from Replica! My favorite is beach walk, itu2019s a gorgeous beachy creamy musk. There is something for everyone! On a Date is a super realistic wine scent and I just get transported. Overall great value for a fun scent experience. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for gifts & try before you buy!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First offu2026this sampler set is the absolute perfect gift! It includes several different scents that are all beautiful! I love having options & it being a sample size is perfect to u201ctryu201d before you buy the full size! I love all of them but u201cwhen the rain stopsu201d is a beautiful scent!

reviews.review_title: A great way to sample the fragrances
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set! It was perfect for someone like me who was looking for their signature scent and needs to give a few different ones a try and they were all beautiful! They last all day and are so fun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By the fireplace is one of favorites. I get so many compliments when I wear it. This sample set gave me a chance to try a few other options. I like to later autumn vibes with By the fire. Also the smaller size is great for traveling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this set for free and it is the best. itu2019s great just to try new fragrances without purchasing the whole bottle. they are also perfect little bottles to carry in your purse. my favorite scent is the Jazz Club, Beach Walk, and Sailing Day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: They all are very high quality and realistic. I was shocked how accurate the fireplace one was. I also liked autumn vibes cause of its unique scent profile. My personal favorite is by the fireplace.

reviews.review_title: Perfect set for finding your new clean fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this sample set! I am a sucker for fresh scents that lean unisex, and this box truly hit for me. There is a wide variety of scents but they all fall under the light & clean category. There isnu2019t one that I didnu2019t like, they spray on fragrant and last a decent amount of time on the skin. Would definitely recommend this sample set if youu2019re looking to try something new!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect gift for any perfume lover. I loved being able to try all of their scents before deciding which ones I might want to purchase later on in a full size. The bottles are sample sized, but thereu2019s so many scents that this box will last you a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this perfume set. Itu2019s perfect for people like me who are still getting into fragrance & not sure which notes I like. I particularly liked the bubbly scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume sampler sei is awesome.  Most of all are unisex scent. I like the scent named Lazy Sunday morning the most. This scent is more feminine last many house and good projection. I usually  like to put on my pulse points. Other scents were interesting scent too. It was fun to try many of them and share with my husband. Especially when having a trip, the package is perfect to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good idea, I could try out 10 different fragrances to see which I liked the best! There is enough in each sample to test them for days and see which you like! The scents themselves range from floral to smokey and clean so thereu2019s something for everybody! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Love the scent, so-so on the value
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 5/5 stars for replica scents/fragrances 3/5 stars for value  I think this is a great gift for someone interested in the brands fragrances or someone who does not live near a Sephora and would not be able to test the fragrances. I think this would be a 5/5 if it included a 10% off coupon for a fragrance or something like that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these perfumes. They all smell so good. I choose a different one each day: always get compliments too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sample set because I can really test out the wear and how each will smell on my skin. I had only tried bubble bath before, but now I have found Sailing Day and On A Date to be my new favs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume sampler, complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. Well I really like most of the perfumes except for like four of them which give me a headache.  I think my favorite overall is Sailing Day.  I would not buy these on my own because they are tiny and most of them are only half full, I do not feel they are worth the price point for samples only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance sampler set is fantastic bringing all of the favorites from the Replica line. My personal favorite is the Smokey and sweet By The Fireplace. The price is a bit steep but the quality is apparent in each fragrance. This set would be a great gift or a good purchase if youu2019re interested in buying from the Replica line.

reviews.review_title: A Gifr I Want For Myself
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This sampler set is the perfect gift for someone looking to find their signature scent. I love every single one of them to be completely honest. I can throw one in purse, desk, vehicle, etc and always have a gorgeous fragrance at the ready

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a lovely sampler set of excellent quality, unique perfumes! Each fragrance is long lasting and absolutely intoxicating! This would make a great gift for the holidays for any perfume lover. Itu2019s also an excellent bargain as you get 10 different fragrances. A wonderful way to test them out to decide which ones you want to get in a bigger size. Iu2019d highly recommend this set to others and will be back to get a few of these in bigger sizes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these perfumes. They all smell so good. I choose a different one each day: always get compliments too.
